attributes.action: return st james park to st james park Newcastle up on tyne
attributes.additional_details:
As a newcastle united supporter I feel violated that mike Ashley has changed the name of st james park a tyneside and world known name to the sports direct arena there is a lot of ill feeling from global newcastle united supporters and we wou,d like the govetments help to return the name of st james park.

Thankyou
              Geoff themagpie Robinson
